decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with key combo pieces like Archon of Cruelty and Emperor of Bones, before using reanimation spells like Unearth and Persist to bring them back onto the battlefield. It also includes disruption like Thoughtseize and Spell Pierce to protect the combo and control the game. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and disrupt their game plan, ultimately winning through either quick aggression or a powerful late-game combo.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of red, white, green, blue, and black colors. It aims to control the board with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Leyline Binding while deploying powerful creatures like Ragavan, Phlage, and Scion of Draco to quickly defeat the opponent. The deck also features Leyline cards to provide additional benefits and synergies with other cards. With a diverse range of creatures and spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a fast victory in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer, while also utilizing cards like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment for additional damage and removal. The deck also includes cards like Voice of Victory and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury for added versatility and power. The mana base is streamlined with fetch lands like Arid Mesa and Marsh Flats to ensure consistent mana sources for the high mana cost cards. The deck aims to quickly establish board presence and maintain pressure on the opponent.

The main focus of this Dimir Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's plays through a combination of removal spells, hand disruption, and counterspells. The deck includes a variety of tools such as Thoughtseize, Fatal Push, and Counterspell to help maintain board control and limit the opponent's options. It also has resilient threats like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Murktide Regent to apply pressure and close out the game. Additionally, the deck includes card advantage engines like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Meticulous Archive to help maintain resource advantage throughout the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifact creatures and artifacts to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and card advantage. By efficiently ramping out artifacts with cards like Mox Opal and Springleaf Drum, as well as generating value through cards like Thoughtcast and Emry, Lurker of the Loch, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence and close out games quickly. Urza's Saga provides additional value and consistency to the deck, while cards like Cranial Plating and Shadowspear offer additional power and versatility in combat situations.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. The key strategy involves using hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to disrupt your opponent's plans, while also using removal spells like Fatal Push and Solitude to deal with threats. The deck also utilizes creatures with powerful abilities such as Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to generate value and control the board. By combining disruption and aggression, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils. It also includes cards like Solitude and Prismatic Ending to deal with threats on the board. The inclusion of companions like Kaheera, the Orphanguard adds an additional layer of synergy to the deck. The mana base is designed to support the control elements of the deck, with options for fetch lands and dual lands. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while establishing control and eventually winning through card advantage and powerful spells.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful burn spells. The deck aims to quickly deal damage to the opponent, utilizing cards like Cori-Steel Cutter, Monastery Swiftspear, and Dragon's Rage Channeler to apply pressure. Lightning Bolt, Lava Dart, and Violent Urge provide additional reach and removal, while tools like Preordain and Mishra's Bauble help with card selection and deck thinning. The deck also includes lands like Steam Vents and Scalding Tarn to ensure the proper colors of mana are available for its spells.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, supported by powerful removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment. The deck also includes cards like Ranger-Captain of Eos and Haliya, Guided by Light to provide additional utility and protection for key creatures. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah serves as a versatile finisher and support card, while Arena of Glory helps to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and aggressive game plan.

The key concept of this UR Aggro deck is to aggressively control the board and deal quick and efficient damage to the opponent. By utilizing cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Monastery Swiftspear, and Slickshot Show-Off, the deck aims to maintain tempo and pressure. Spells such as Lightning Bolt, Lava Dart, and Mutagenic Growth provide direct damage and removal options, while cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration help with card advantage and deck manipulation. The inclusion of Violent Urge and Cori-Steel Cutter offer additional ways to disrupt the opponent's game plan and secure victory.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. It utilizes cards like Teferi, Time Raveler to slow down the opponent and Prismatic Ending to deal with threats. The deck also features efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Solitude. Additionally, it aims to generate value through cards like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp. The creatures in the deck have various abilities that can help control the board, such as bouncing permanents or gaining life. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while beating them down with aggressive creatures.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy and controlling the game through a combination of counter spells, removal spells, and hand disruption. It aims to maintain card advantage with card draw spells and efficient threats like Murktide Regent. The deck also includes cards that provide additional value, such as Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Quantum Riddler. The mana base is designed to provide consistent access to the necessary colors of mana for the deck's spells. Overall, the deck seeks to outlast and outmaneuver the opponent until it can establish a dominant position and secure the win.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize artifact creatures and synergy with artifacts to create a fast-paced aggressive strategy. The deck includes powerful artifacts like Urza's Saga and Mox Opal to generate mana and resources quickly, while cards like Thought Monitor and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide card advantage and utility. By combining aggressive creatures like Pinnacle Emissary and Kappa Cannoneer with control elements like Metallic Rebuke and Pithing Needle, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a versatile and efficient game plan in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on generating mana quickly with rituals and mana-generating spells in order to cast powerful spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Grapeshot to deal damage to the opponent. It also utilizes Past in Flames to recur spells from the graveyard and has Wish cards to tutor for specific answers or win conditions. The deck aims to set up a explosive turn where it casts multiple spells in a single turn to overwhelm the opponent and win the game in a burst of spellcasting power.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent through low-cost spells and aggressive creatures. By utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on and close out the game swiftly. Additionally, cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration help to maintain card advantage and dig for key pieces to further push the aggressive game plan. The deck aims to be fast and efficient in dealing damage to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to respond.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of cheap counterspells, card draw, and tutors to assemble a powerful combo involving Goblin Charbelcher. The goal is to generate enough mana to activate Charbelcher and use its ability to deal lethal damage to the opponent directly from the library. The deck includes a package of cheap, efficient spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect the combo pieces, while also generating card advantage and filtering through the deck to find the necessary pieces for the combo to win the game quickly.
